name: Agaricus bisporus
basic_care: Keep in a cool, dark place with consistent moisture. Avoid direct sunlight.
ideal_environment: Moist, humid conditions with temperatures between 13-16°C.

name: Chanterelle
basic_care: Chanterelles require a moist environment and prefer indirect light.
ideal_environment: Woodland areas with high humidity and temperatures of 15-21°C.

name: Shiitake
basic_care: Requires a consistent humidity level and temperatures between 10-21°C.
ideal_environment: Shade, with high humidity and well-drained organic matter like logs or sawdust.

name: Oyster Mushroom
basic_care: Prefers a cool, humid environment with plenty of airflow.
ideal_environment: Grow in dark, humid areas with temperatures between 13-18°C.

name: Lion's Mane
basic_care: Keep in a humid environment with moderate light. Requires slightly acidic conditions.
ideal_environment: Cool, shaded environments with temperatures between 15-21°C.

name: Enoki Mushroom
basic_care: Enoki mushrooms require cooler temperatures and high humidity for proper growth.
ideal_environment: Temperatures of 4-10°C, with high humidity and indirect light.

name: Maitake
basic_care: Maitake mushrooms require cool temperatures and a humid environment.
ideal_environment: Shady, moist conditions with temperatures between 10-16°C.

name: Morel Mushroom
basic_care: Requires moisture and can be grown in well-drained soil with mild sunlight.
ideal_environment: Temperatures between 15-21°C, with well-drained, moist soil.

name: Porcini

ideal_environment: Shaded forest environments, temperatures between 10-16°C.

name: Cordyceps

name: King Oyster Mushroom

name: Reishi
basic_care: Reishi mushrooms prefer high humidity and moderate temperatures.

name: Truffle
